name: SentrySafe Charcoal Gray Waterproof and Fireproof Safe, Lock Box with Keypad for Documents and Hanging File Folders, Exterior: 14.1 x 16.6 x 13.8 Inches, ‎FHW40300
short_description: HEAVY DUTY FIREPROOF SAFE BOX: UL classified for fire endurance (1/2 hour at 1550°F) to protect critical home or business documents, records, and valuables from fire damage
DIGITAL MEDIA PROTECTION: ETL verified (1/2 hour at 1550°F) to protect CDs, memory sticks, and other digital media
WATER AND FLOOD PROTECTION: Home safe is ETL verified for water submersion up to 72 hours; providing peace of mind in the event of flood
COLOR: The fire safe box exterior has a charcoal gray finish
MEASUREMENTS: The lockbox interior is 11.6 in. H x 12 in. W x 8.1 in. D, and the exterior is 14.1 in. H x 16.6 in. W x 13.8 in. D
DIGITAL LOCK: Document safe has a programmable digital lock for added security and personalization
product_description: Introducing the SentrySafe Charcoal Gray Waterproof and Fireproof Safe, a robust and reliable lock box designed to protect your most valuable possessions. Whether you’re safeguarding important documents, cherished keepsakes, or essential financial records, this fireproof safe offers unparalleled security and peace of mind. With its sleek charcoal gray exterior, this safe box seamlessly blends into any home or office setting, providing a discreet yet formidable barrier against fire and water damage. Measuring 14.1 in. high x 16 in. wide x 13.8 in. deep, the SentrySafe FHW is the perfect size for those seeking a compact yet highly effective solution for their security needs. Engineered to withstand the harshest conditions, this fireproof document box is UL Classified to endure up to 30 minutes at 1550°F, ensuring that your documents and valuables remain intact even in the event of a fire. Additionally, the safe is ETL Verified for water resistance, offering protection against water damage when submerged for up to 72 hours. This makes it an ideal choice for those living in areas prone to flooding or other water-related disasters. The SentrySafe FHW is not just a fireproof and waterproof safe; it’s a comprehensive security solution for your home or office. Equipped with a user-friendly keypad, this lock box with key provides quick and easy access to your belongings while maintaining top-notch security. The interior is designed to accommodate hanging file folders, making it a practical fireproof document safe for organizing important papers. Whether you’re looking for a small safe for home use or a fireproof cash box for your business, the SentrySafe Charcoal Gray Waterproof and Fireproof Safe is the ultimate choice. Invest in the best fireproof and waterproof safe for your home today and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with knowing your valuables are protected against the unexpected.
